attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to see this country come away from the eu and be independent and regain our pride in britian again. i cannot see any reason for us belonging to the eu as we are constantly having to plough money to help other states when it could be better spent here and get nothing but rules regulations and being told what we can and can't do. enough is enough. the first party that promises to take britian out of the eu will get my vote

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
